Segment.name: LH1
Segment.comment: To specify the hazardous commodity identification reference number and quantity

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: LadingQuantity
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: UnNaIdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the hazardous material identification number as required by Title 49 of the code of Federal Regulations; UN/NA stands for United Nations/North America

Field.name: HazardousMaterialsPage
Field.comment: The United Nations page number as required for the international transport of hazardous materials

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: CompartmentIdCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the compartment in a compartmentalized tank car

Field.name: ResidueIndicatorCode
Field.comment: Code indicating that the material being described is that which remains in a packaging (including a tank car) after it has been unloaded

Field.name: PackingGroupCode
Field.comment: Code indicating degree of danger in terms of Roman number I, II or III

Field.name: InterimHazardousMaterialRegulatoryNumber
Field.comment: Identifies the current regulatory version number used for hazardous materials shipments

SyntaxNote.name: P0607
SyntaxNote.comment: If either LH106 or LH107 is present, then the other is required.
